Articles.Content: Ok, i am trying to launch the core module of the , community space station i am building for youtube. I am trying to,use the shell fairings from the kwrocketry extras folder and felbourn's cfg update to them. Problem is, i have no idea of how to i n sert his additions. Please help!
Have you removed the procedural fairings module?
Well I don't know what to do if I don't see what you have.
Want me to send you the stuff i have later?
You can use the BB code to paste their contents in a format that makes sense. That would be best
I kinda can't do that at this time...on phone

Aren't Felbourns configs just Module Manager configs? You would just stick those in the GameData directory somewhere (presumably in whatever folder they are in within the download) and they should work fine. You would of course need Module Manager to go along with them.

If you're trying to manually alter some fairings you would end up needing to change/add the drag cube definitions for it to work, assuming I have properly grasped how he made them work.
Oh! That might explain why my rockets seem towant to fly backwards all the time...
